title: Watch: Biden’s FEMA administrator: ‘You can take simple steps to prepare for hurricanes, including getting the COVID-19 vaccine’
cleaned_text:
Biden FEMA administrator Deanne Criswell: 'You can take simple steps to prepare for hurricanes, including getting the COVID-19 vaccine'

Biden FEMA administrator Deanne Criswell: ‘You can take simple steps to prepare for hurricanes, including getting the COVID-19 vaccine’

FEMA: The Best Way To Prepare for Hurricanes Is By Getting The Covid Vaccine. pic.twitter.com/aHUR0svr9M
